articles.author: Sharon Adarlo
articles.title: Companies Find That AI Projects Have Had "Dismal" Financial Results - Futurism
articles.description: A new report on generative AI reveals that many companies in much of the world are not making a profit on their AI products.
articles.content:
Brace yourselves for the "Trough of Disillusionment."
Flash in the Pan
When OpenAI first released ChatGPT to the public back in late 2022, many people in business were gripped with an intense case … [+2547 chars]
